thread.title: Pastor outed on Ashley Madison commits suicide - KCRA-TV Sacramento
thread.title_full: Pastor outed on Ashley Madison commits suicide - KCRA-TV Sacramento - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KCRA-TV Sacramento
title: Pastor outed on Ashley Madison commits suicide - KCRA-TV Sacramento
text:
The CEO of Ashley Madison's parent company, Avid Life Media Inc., stepped down Friday, Aug. 28. An Avid Life Media press release stated that the decision for Noel Biderman to step down was a joint one. John Gibson was a pastor and seminary professor.
 KCRA-TV Sacramento.
